generatedTitle: The Communards' Hit Cover of "Don't Leave Me This Way" and the Vocalists Behind It

extractFactDictList.question: Who sang with the Communards on 'Don't Leave Me This Way'?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In conclusion, the Communards' version of 'Don't Leave Me This Way' was sung by Jimmy Somerville and Richard Coles.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the original version of 'Don't Leave Me This Way' recorded?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The original version of the song was recorded by Thelma Houston in 1975.
